entry.title: Software developer Python/C++
entry.summary: AMESYS (www.amesys.fr) is the biggest subsidiary of Crescendo-Industries Group (800 employees in France and abroad). We deal with architecture of critical systems for leading companies in Defence and Aerospace, Telecoms, Transport, Energy and Industry, Microelectronics, Network and Security and IT. AMESYS offers a full range of services: Products, Hardware and Software Solutions Development, Consulting and Auditing, R&D Outsourcing, Offshore ($ zone).
entry.content:
For one of its projects in the automotive sector in Munich, Germany, Amesys is looking for a software developper. You will be in charge of:

  • Porterage of a catalog of functions from Python to C++ using DLL (visual studio, eclipse)
  • Creation of Design-Guidelines for the implementation and the verification of the catalog of functions
  • Verification and documentation

You have an Engineer degree and you have been working for at least 2 years as a software developper. You have a good knowledge of Python and C++.

We require good English. German would be appreciated.

To apply or for further information, please contact: n.durand@amesys.fr
